item.title: Docker API Privilege Escalation [Remote][EN]
item.description: This document has the objective to explain a simple way to remotely make a privilege escalation in a Docker, using it’s own Engine API service. During my analisys routine I manage to successfully make an attack, so I decided to share freely. I`ve made an image available containing a SSH service enabled in the Docker Hub to help in the attack (The image available it’s huge, more than 200MB because of the Ubuntu base image.
